lead_paragraph: Both sides are addressed in this documentary, which largely focuses on viewpoints and personal experiences in Missouri and Illinois.

headline.print_headline: Review: Beyond the Politics in ‘Abortion: Stories Women Tell’
headline.main: Review: Beyond the Politics in ‘Abortion: Stories Women Tell’

snippet: Both sides are addressed in this documentary, which largely focuses on viewpoints and personal experiences in Missouri and Illinois....
abstract: Helen T Verongos reviews Tracy Droz Tragos documentary film Abortion: Stories Women Tell.
